title: WTB: T206 with no ink in faces!
author: Charlie Faust III

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 with no ink in faces!
posts.post_content:
I am looking for T206 with white ghost faces (No flesh-tone ink).  I have a few and would like to make a nice scan with a group of white ghost faces so I can post them on a nice thread on main page.

I'm weird; I know it. 

Let me know what you have and your asking price.

Take care Charlie

I'm weird; I know it.[/QUOTE]


I can dig it :D
